label: Whole Genome SNP Analysis
description: Identify SNP differences in a genome group with genomes of the same species.

parameters.desc: Geneomes can be passed via (genome group / fasta file )
parameters.label: Input Type

parameters.desc: Minimum fraction of genomes with locus. This is an optional parameter use dot calcuate a tree based on only SNP loci occuring in at least this fraction of genomes.

parameters.label: Genome group
parameters.desc: Name of feature group that defines the gene set

parameters.label: Output Folder
parameters.desc: Path to which the output will be written. Defaults to the directory containing the input data.

parameters.label: File Basename
parameters.desc: Basename for the generated output files. Defaults to the basename of the input data.
